Class AbstractGriddedSurfaceWithSubsets

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Location>, Container2D<Location>, GriddedSurface, RuptureSurface, Named
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApproxGriddedSurface, GriddedSurfaceWithSubsets, GriddedSurfFromSimpleFaultData

    public abstract class AbstractGriddedSurfaceWithSubsets
extends AbstractGriddedSurface
    Title: AbstractGriddedSurface

    Description: This class extends GriddedSurface to included sampling subset regions.

    • Method Detail

      • getNthSubsetSurface

        public GriddedSubsetSurface getNthSubsetSurface(int numSubSurfaceCols,
                                       int numSubSurfaceRows,
                                       int numSubSurfaceOffsetAlong,
                                       int numSubSurfaceOffsetDown,
                                       int n)
        Gets the Nth subSurface on the surface
        Parameters:
        numSubSurfaceCols - Number of grid points in subsurface length
        numSubSurfaceRows - Number of grid points in subsurface width
        numSubSurfaceOffsetAlong - Number of grid points for offset along strike
        numSubSurfaceOffsetDown - Number of grid points for offset down dip
        n - The index of the desired surface (from 0 to (getNumSubsetSurfaces - 1))

      • getNthSubsetSurface

        public GriddedSubsetSurface getNthSubsetSurface(double subSurfaceLength,
                                       double subSurfaceWidth,
                                       double subSurfaceOffset,
                                       int n)
        Gets the Nth subSurface on the surface.
        Parameters:
        subSurfaceLength - subsurface length in km
        subSurfaceWidth - subsurface width in km
        subSurfaceOffset - offset in km
        n - The index of the desired surface (from 0 to (getNumSubsetSurfaces - 1))

      • getNthSubsetSurfaceCenteredDownDip

        public GriddedSubsetSurface getNthSubsetSurfaceCenteredDownDip(double subSurfaceLength,
                                                      double subSurfaceWidth,
                                                      double subSurfaceOffset,
                                                      int n)
        Gets the Nth subSurface centered down dip on the surface. If surface is not perfectly centered, (numRows-numRowsInRup != even number), rupture is one grid increment closer to top then to bottom.
        Parameters:
        subSurfaceLength - subsurface length in km
        subSurfaceWidth - subsurface width in km
        subSurfaceOffset - offset in km
        n - The index of the desired surface (from 0 to (getNumSubsetSurfaces - 1))

      • getNumSubsetSurfaces

        public int getNumSubsetSurfaces(double subSurfaceLength,
                       double subSurfaceWidth,
                       double subSurfaceOffset)
        Parameters:
        subSurfaceLength - subSurface length in km
        subSurfaceWidth - subSurface Width in km
        subSurfaceOffset - subSurface offset in km
        Returns:
        total number of subSurface along the fault

      • getNumSubsetSurfacesAlongLength

        public int getNumSubsetSurfacesAlongLength(double subSurfaceLength,
                                  double subSurfaceOffset)
        This computes the number of subset surfaces along the length only (not down dip)
        Parameters:
        subSurfaceLength - subSurface length in km
        subSurfaceOffset - subSurface offset
        Returns:
        total number of subSurface along the fault
